#type: # DE1 dedicated for TCON_LCD1/TCON_TV1 tv output blocks
# channel base for de33 calculated as:

column4: BLD_FILL_COLOR_CTL Offset 0x000 BLD fill color control register
BLD_CH_RTCTL BLD routing control register (default value 0x00543210)
ix=0: Y, ix=1: U/UV channel, ix=3: V channel
OVL_V horizontal down sample control register
OVL_V vertical down sample control register
OVL_UI FBD header low address register
OVL_UI FBD header high address register
OVL_UI FBD payload low address register
OVL_UI FBD payload high address register
OVL_UI FBD overlay window size register
OVL_UI FBD memory block coordinate register
OVL_UI FBD memory block coordinate register
OVL_UI FBD overlay window size register
OVL_UI FBD bist start address register
OVL_UI FBD bist end address register
OVL_UI FBD bist data mark register
VSU Sharpness Control Coring Setting Register
VSU Sharpness Control Gain Setting 0 Register
VSU Sharpness Control Gain Setting 1 Register
VSU Y Channel Horizontal Step Register
VSU Y Channel Vertical Step Register
VSU Y Channel Horizontal Initial Phase Register
VSU Y Channel Vertical Initial Phase 0 Register
VSU Y Channel Vertical Initial Phase 1 Register
VSU C Channel Horizontal Step Register
VSU C Channel Vertical Step Register
VSU C Channel Horizontal Initial Phase Register
VSU C Channel Vertical Initial Phase 0 Register
VSU C Channel Vertical Initial Phase 1 Register
0x200+N*4 VSU Y Channel Horizontal Filter Coefficient0 Register N N = M 1))
0x300+N*4 VSU Y Channel Horizontal Filter Coefficient1 Register N N = M 1
0x400+N*4 VSU Y Channel Vertical Filter Coefficient Register N N = M 1))
0x600+N*4 VSU C Channel Horizontal Filter Coefficient0 Register N N = M 1))
0x700+N*4 VSU C Channel Horizontal Filter Co efficient1 Register N N = M 1))
0x800+N*4 VSU C Channel Vertical Filter Coefficient Register N N = M 1))
CE chroma compensation function setting register
